summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the contract rezone granted by Ordinance 115663, which amended Plat 40W, page 10 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 700 Union Street from Downtown Office Core 2 (DOC/2) to Downtown Office Core 1 (DOC/1); accepting a Fourth Amended Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Community Development
vote: Passed 6/24/02: 5-3 (No: Conlin, Licata, Pageler, Excused: Steinbrueck). Vote to override veto failed 07/22/02: 5-4 (No: Conlin, Licata, Pageler, Steinbrueck). (A vote to override requires 6 votes)
note: TDR, Transfer of Development Rights, Development Credits, Hedreen
